description.value:
You have spent a great deal of time living in or around a temple or other community of faith, and the lessons you have taken away from it mean a great deal to you. Though the wider world now calls to you, the faith you've nurtured ever guides you and brings you comfort in trying times.

Skill Proficiency: Pick one of the following: Culture, Intimidation, Perform, Persuasion, Theology.

Trade Proficiency: Art (Choose any Specialization), Botany, Cooking, Entertainment (Singing or Musical Instrument).

Background Feature: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.CZKRUMYCK6X1L5WN]{Beseech Providence}

Equipment:

  • Either an amulet (holy focus) or idol (holy focus).
  • One of the following: An art kit, botany kit, cooking kit, or a musical instrument.
